name: CET Comité Européen de la Trefilerie (European Committee for Wire Drawing)
goal:
- promote the interests of the manufacturers of wire and wire products in Europe.
- exchange market research information on wire and wire products.
- safeguard common interests vis-à-vis national governments and the European Commission as well as other political and non-political institutions.
- represent its members to the scientific and technical organizations which deal directly or indirectly with problems relating to wire and wire products.
-discuss questions of overall interest to the whole wire industry.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Trade
euInitiatives:
Safe guards
NOx exhaust
Anti dumping trade issues
Best available practice for wire drawing
CO2 footprint
Reach Borax; Cr6
